SEARCH
Package proj

Class ServiceManager

java.lang.Object
proj.ServiceManager
public class ServiceManager extends Object
Manages the core services of the mobility application. This class handles data loading from files, user interactions for creating rentals, data validation, and business logic such as calculating total revenue. It acts as a central coordinator for the application's operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • ServiceManager

  • Method Details

    • addRentals

      public void addRentals(ArrayList<Rental> rentals, ArrayList<User> users, ArrayList<Vehicle> vehicles)
      Interactively prompts the user to add new rentals to the system. This method guides the user through a console-based interface to input rental details. It validates the existence of the user and vehicle, checks date formats, and ensures all required information is gathered before creating a new Rental object. The process can be repeated to add multiple rentals in one session.
      Parameters:
      rentals - The list of Rental objects to which new rentals will be added.
      users - The list of available Users in the system.
      vehicles - The list of available Vehicles in the system.

    • listRentals

      public void listRentals(ArrayList<Rental> rentals)
      Prints all rentals in the provided list to the console using their toString representation.
      Parameters:
      rentals - The list of rentals to display.

    • readUsers

      public void readUsers(String path, ArrayList<User> dest)
      Reads user data from a comma-separated text file and populates a list of User objects. The file format determines the type of user (Student, Lecturer, NonLecturer) to be created. Lines with incorrect formatting are skipped.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the user data file.
      dest - The list to be populated with User objects.

    • readVehicles

      public void readVehicles(String path, ArrayList<Vehicle> dest)
      Reads vehicle data from a text file and populates a list of Vehicle objects.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the vehicle data file.
      dest - The list to be populated with Vehicle objects.

    • readRentals

      public void readRentals(String path, ArrayList<Rental> dest)
      Reads serialized Rental objects from a file.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the object file.
      dest - The list to be populated with Rental objects.

    • writeRentals

      public void writeRentals(String path, ArrayList<Rental> src)
      Writes a list of Rental objects to a file via serialization.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the output file.
      src - The list of Rental objects to serialize.

    • calculateRentalPrice

      public double calculateRentalPrice(User user, Vehicle vehicle, double durationInHours, boolean hasHelmet, boolean hasLight)
      Calculates the final price for a rental.
      Parameters:
      user - The user renting.
      vehicle - The vehicle being rented.
      durationInHours - The total duration of the rental in hours.
      hasHelmet - Whether a helmet is included.
      hasLight - Whether a light is included.
      Returns:
      The final cost in Euros.

    • calculateTotalRevenue

      public double calculateTotalRevenue(ArrayList<Rental> rentals)
      Calculates the total revenue from a list of rentals.
      Parameters:
      rentals - The list of rentals to process.
      Returns:
      The total revenue in Euros.
